verses.verse: And seven <WH7651> women <WH802> shall take hold <WH2388> of one <WH259> man <WH376> in that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>, We will eat <WH398> our own bread <WH3899>, and wear <WH3847> our own apparel <WH8071>: only let us be called <WH7121> by thy name <WH8034>; take thou away <WH622> our reproach <WH2781>.

In that day <WH3117> shall the branch <WH6780> of Jehovah <WH3068> be beautiful <WH6643> and glorious <WH3519>, and the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776> shall be excellent <WH1347> and comely for <WH8597> them that are escaped <WH6413> of Israel <WH3478>.

And it shall come to pass <WH7604>, that he that is left in Zion <WH6726>, and he that remaineth <WH3498> in Jerusalem <WH3389>, shall be called <WH559> holy <WH6918>, even every one that is written <WH3789> among the living <WH2416> in Jerusalem <WH3389>;

when the Lord <WH136> shall have washed away <WH7364> the filth <WH6675> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, and shall have purged <WH1740> the blood <WH1818> of Jerusalem <WH3389> from the midst <WH7130> thereof <WH7307>, by the spirit of justice <WH4941>, and by the spirit <WH7307> of burning <WH1197>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will create <WH1254> over the whole habitation <WH4349> of mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>, and over her assemblies <WH4744>, a cloud <WH6051> and smoke <WH6227> by day <WH3119>, and the shining <WH5051> of a flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>; for over all the glory <WH3519> shall be spread a covering <WH2646>.

And there shall be a pavilion <WH5521> for a shade <WH6738> in the day-time <WH3119> from the heat <WH2721>, and for a refuge <WH4268> and for a covert <WH4563> from storm <WH2230> and from rain <WH4306>.
